Package helperDB

Class AppointmentsQuery

java.lang.Object
helperDB.AppointmentsQuery
public abstract class AppointmentsQuery extends Object
The appointment query class contains all helper functions for accessing the SQL database for appointments.

  • Method Details

    • insertApp

      public static int insertApp(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerId, int userId, int contactId) throws SQLException
      insertApp function adds an appointment to the SQL database.
      Parameters:
      title - title of appointment to be inserted
      description - description of appointment to be inserted
      location - location of appointment to be inserted
      type - type of appointment to be inserted
      start - start time of appointment to be inserted
      end - end time of appointment to be inserted
      customerId - customer id of appointment to be inserted
      userId - user id associated with the appointment to be inserted
      contactId - contact id associated with the appointment to be inserted
      Returns:
      integer value of how many changes took place
      Throws:
      SQLException - exception in case sql commands return an error

    • updateApp

      Throws:
      SQLException

      Returns:

      Throws:
